  • Method Details

    • playEffect

      public int playEffect(Scanner scanner, PlayerController PC, boolean bPlayedManually, Boolean bIsHandCard, String messageForPlayerWhenForced)

      Special Effect:
      As written in the rules. If the owner has a King or Prince in their hand, they must discard this card.
      The card does not have any effect when discarded.


      Is called if a player should discard this card (manual or forced by an other player).

      Return codes:

      • RC_OK: The card was played successfully.
      • RC_ERR: The card was not played successfully.
      • RC_OK_HANDS_UPDATED: The card was played successfully and players hands have been already updated.
      • RC_OK_PLAYER_KNOCKED_OUT: The card was played successfully and the player has been knocked out.
      Specified by:
      playEffect in class ACard
      Parameters:
      scanner - The scanner to read the input from. This is only used if the card is played manually (if not manually, null is safe to pass).
      PC - The Player Controller to play the card for.
      bPlayedManually - True if the card is played manually, false otherwise.
      bIsHandCard - True if the card is a hand card, false otherwise. Null is safe to pass if not played manually.
      messageForPlayerWhenForced - Message to display to the player if the card is forced to be played. Null is safe to pass if played manually.
      Returns:
      Return code.
